title: 英翻中意思
content:
＇I don't care what you think, but I genuinely do care. I think it's funny when people are like, 'I love how you just don't give a fuck.' I'm like, 'Oh my God. I give so many fucks. I want to be liked.'

請問這句話英文是什麼意思？請卡友解答,謝謝～～
